OOC: I think Dachande posted Magmatron leaving.  If not, he should have.

::Cygnar::
    He watched Magmatron leave the conference room.  "Apocalypse, it's time 
to begin our battle plans."  He opens a com to Ramjet.  (If Ramjet's there 
just ignore this part.)  "Ramjet, I need you in the conference room now."  He 
turns off the com and brings up the map.  He hits a few buttons and the map 
splits into two smaller maps.  One shows North America, the other shows the 
Middle East.  He then highlights the Destron bases on each map in blue.  The 
known enemy base (Trainers) he highlighted in red.  The Destron's allies 
(Predacons) were highlighted in green.  The other two bases in North America 
(Chivtron and Decepticon) were highlighted in yellow because they were 
relatively unknown bases.  "My recommendation is to attack the Trainers, 
here."  The red dot blinks.  "Ramjet and I were planning a battle there when 
the rest of the Destrons returned.  I think we could take them now but if we 
need reinforcements we can always get the Predacons to back us up.  The 
reason I recommend attacking the Trainers is that they pose the greatest 
threat to our bases.  There are no other bases near ours that are known 
enemies.  If, Apocalypse, you agree, then I will formulate a plan of attack."
